aboutUs.title: Who are we
aboutUs.description1: The AEH was founded in 1979 to support people with disabilities, with the implementation of the UN Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCRPD) being a central goal.
aboutUs.description2: As a co-founder of the European Disability Forum (EDF), the AEH is part of a significant institution advocating for the interests of people with disabilities at the European and international level.
aboutUs.description3: Currently, the AEH focuses on the challenges arising from the aging of people with disabilities, particularly with regard to improving their living conditions.

organisationPage.title: Organisation
organisationPage.structureDescription1: AEH is an association of organizations that are actively representing the interests of and for people with disabilities. All organizations affiliated with AEH are based in one of the European countries.
organisationPage.structureDescription2: AEH is politically and denominationally neutral. The business is conducted by a voluntary presidium, which consists of a president, three vice presidents, a treasurer, and board members.
